nodes.bodyText:
Because clear shutdown manager method is deprecated and I don’t want this bit of code to be removed.
Because the cucumber tests are integration tests, the test runner doesn’t always know what is started.  ( i.e. we don’t create every object in test setup ) so it doesn’t know if a task is going to create a shutdown task or not.
This was prompted by a JSon object creating a shutdown task that stuck around and failed the test, despite the fact that all the test steps completed successfully.
